sentence.Network_en: By 1961 anti - submarine warfare and counterinsurgency were their favorite candidates.
sentence.Network_cn: 到1961年, 反 潜艇战和反叛乱就成为他们选中的两个题目.

sentence.Network_en: And as he notes, that would have consequences for the counterinsurgency.
sentence.Network_cn: 就像他说的,叛乱会引发严重后果.

sentence.Network_en: Counterinsurgency involves military action but also depends on civilian relationships to succeed.
sentence.Network_cn: 反叛乱的成功不仅包括军事行动,还依赖于平民关系.
